summary: An English couple's holiday in Spain is interrupted when they discover a girl imprisoned in a cabin.
cast: Gary Oldman|Virginie Ledoyen|Paddy Considine|Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Lluís Homar|Jon Ariño|Álex Angulo|Kandido Uranga|Andrés Gertrúdix|Patxi Bisquert|Savitri Ceballos|José Andrés Zalguegui|Ramón Churruca|Isabel Jiménez|Yaiza Esteve
title: Bosque de sombras
